cookies_page.title: Cookie Policy — AKIOS
cookies_page.description: Cookie Policy describing cookie usage and user consent on akios.ai.
cookies_page.heading: Cookie Policy
cookies_page.category_1: Strictly necessary (session, load balancing, security). Always active.
cookies_page.category_2: We do not use analytics or advertising cookies.
cookies_page.category_3: Marketing/Advertising: Not used. If added, explicit opt-in required.
cookies_page.consent_1: We do not use analytics or advertising cookies under our control. Only strictly necessary cookies may be used for security and basic site operation (including by our hosting provider).
cookies_page.consent_2: Under CNIL guidance, strictly necessary cookies do not require consent.
cookies_page.control_content: Clear browser cookies if needed. We do not use tracking or analytics cookies under our control.

cookies_page.category_1: Strictement nécessaires (session, répartition de charge, sécurité). Toujours actifs.
cookies_page.category_2: Nous n'utilisons pas de cookies d'analyse ou de publicité.
cookies_page.category_3: Marketing/publicité : Non utilisés. Si ajoutés, opt-in explicite requis.

cookies_page.consent_2: Selon les directives de la CNIL, les cookies strictement nécessaires ne nécessitent pas de consentement.
